title: Bill Belichick and Robert Kraft got snubbed -- so which senior finalists will make the Hall of Fame?

sources.name: CBS Sports NFL
sources.title: Bill Belichick and Robert Kraft got snubbed -- so which senior finalists will make the Hall of Fame?
sources.description: At least one of Ken Anderson, L.C. Greenwood or Roger Craig will be part of the 2026 class
